mutants.code:
def generate_binary(n):
    binary = 'MUTATED'
    while n > 0:
        binary = str(n % 2) + binary
        n = n // 2
    binary = binary.replace('11', '10')
    return binary

def generate_binary(n):
    binary = ''
    while n >= 0:
        binary = str(n % 2) + binary
        n = n // 2
    binary = binary.replace('11', '10')
    return binary
